transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello? Jayprakash sir good morning Vasundhara bol rahi India Mart se.
Executive: Sir wo aapko jo feedback tha ka maine change karne ke liye wo aapka update ho gaya tha. I hope aapne check kar liya hoga aapko panel pe aur Shivani ne bhi aapko bhej diya tha screenshot.
Customer: Ji mam ji mam.
Executive: Theek hai to Shivani ab aapko service ke liye follow kar legi to abhi jo aapka ticket hai wo main close kar du sir?
Customer: Ha mam ji mam.
Executive: Theek hai aapke pass ek feedback aayega aap satisfy ho to usko satisfy kar dijiyega sir theek hai.
Customer: Ji theek hai mam thank you.
Executive: Thank you so much for time have a nice day. Accha ek aur cheez wahi bataye mujhe sir jaise main check bhi kar rahi thi apni service mein jaise lead wagera aapne product ke relevant aa rahi hai but aapne kafi time se bilkul lead use nahi kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai mam.
Executive: Matlab lead bilkul aana band ho gayi?
Customer: Aa hi gayi.
Executive: Band ho gayi.
Customer: Pata hai abhi abhi pata hai kya hai ki sara system AI based hai to ab jo jis tarike ki aap lead consume karoge waise hi aapko lead jayegi to aapne kabhi traderindiamart.com pe check kiya sir?
Executive: Ha mam wo kiya tha maine.
Customer: To apna kya location kuch hai kya ki us particular location mein hum target karte hain ya fir pan India kaise?
Customer: Nahi mam nahi mam.
Executive: Ek minute ab main check karu kyuki abhi se location fir bhi aap pan India hai apna sir?
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Location jo aap ye service provide karte ho matlab apne hi location mein karte hain sir ya fir pan India?
Customer: Pan India karte hain mam.
Executive: Pan India karte hain. Accha agar aap India ka filter main check kar leti hu kya issue aa raha hai sir ek second call pe lijiyega. Tabhi jo Shivani service de rahi tab aapko lead mil rahi thi?
Customer: Ha wo udhar to aa raha tha abhi consistency hai ya fir kya hai pata nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi us time pe aapke pass achi khasi lead aa rahi thi jab Shivani service dekh rahi thi.
Customer: Ha mam char panch mahine pehle to aa rahi thi lead.
Executive: Accha. Theek hai abhi pata hai kya hai yahi hai ki lead kafi time se consume hi nahi hui hai sari category apni B rank ki B rank category mein hai. To wahi ab Shivani kaam karegi aapko whatsapp pe lead search karke aapko share karegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to jitna jyada aap consume karoge aapka purchasing pattern create hoga aapki lead waha pe aana start ho jayegi. Theek hai baki ke direct inquiry aayi hai kya?
Customer: Nahi koi nahi aayi mam.
Executive: Direct inquiry bhi nahi aa rahi aapko?
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi aayi mam.
Executive: Ek minute aapka wo setting check karu ki aapki location ya foreign to nahi hai kuch ek minute sir.
Executive: Nahi setting wali to sari theek hai isme aapka foreign bhi off hai aur location preference aapka sir location preference aapka local hai. To abhi local ki wajah se yaha pe aapko lead nahi show kar rahi hai wahi hai ki ye preference aapka tab change hoga jab aapki consumption pattern pan India hoga. Theek hai to aap koshish kijiyega jo bhi leads aati hai na all over India mein se aap use karna start kar dijiyega. To apna dheere dheere automatically consume karoge to automatically purchasing pattern bhi yaha pe create ho jayega. Theek hai baki ke liye bataye aapko ye pata hai ki review and rating wagera hum kahan se lete hain buyer se?
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Review and rating hum kahan se le sakte hain buyer se?
Customer: Main main baad mein call karu main to ek kaam mein hu mam.
Executive: Ha accha busy hai abhi main ek kaam mein hu ha mam.
Customer: Sir jyada time lungi dekhiye ek just feedback call tha aapke liye.
Executive: Mam aap aapko chahiye main bahar hu aap video call karke dekhoge na main boiler ke upar hu. To isliye 120 degree centigrade.
Executive: Accha accha koi baat nahi sir chaliye theek hai main aapka feedback close kar rahi hu aapke pass feedback mil aayega usko aap satisfy kar dijiyega theek hai chaliye thank you so much for time have a nice day.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer's location preference is set to local.

- Customer is currently busy with work.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed catalog update.

- Executive will have Shivani share leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive explained the importance of consuming leads.

- Executive explained how to change location preference.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to use leads from all over India.

- Customer to satisfy the feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location preference, consumption pattern, whatsapp
